channel.title: Help me on my server?!?!?!?!?
channel.description:
ok i want to know these things
how can i change the way u train, the source set it to train on npcs but i dont like that i want to make ppl train on dummies,hales and doors etc, how?
how can i change the lvl requirements for armour and weps
i am using magicscape v1 source
plz help!

item.title: Help me on my server?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

for training, its addSkillXP(XXX, X);
for npc training its addSkillXP(hitDiff * XXX, X);
for level requirements search (“dragon”)
the return # is the requirement

Read full topic
